item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in the New Haven area.

This week's location is: Marketplace

MarketPlace welcomes the Meetup.com guests with free appetizers during the evening

$3.00 Bud and Bud Light bottle beer.
$3.00 Wine by the glass
$4.00 imported and premium beers per bottle including Redhook Ale and Heineken
$4.00 Mixed Drinks (well), discounted top shelf drinks and Marketplace specialty drinks.

We look forward to welcoming all of you with the most diverse menu in New Haven containing American, Italian, Latin, Indian and Nepalese cuisine selections on Monday February 16th.

On the Web At www.marketplacect.com

Free WiFi and 1/2 price movie tickets (with $10 purchase per person after 5 pm)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

Contact: Melissa VanTine (will email contact information to Yes and Maybes)

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Marketplace
